TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MsmqException extends System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException

summary.span: 由消息队列 (MSMQ) 返回的包装错误。

span.span: Encapsulates errors returned by Message Queuing (MSMQ).

summary.span: 此异常由消息队列传输和消息队列集成通道引发。

span.span: This exception is thrown by the Message Queuing transport and the Message Queuing integration channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当消息队列通道与消息队列交互时可能会引发此异常，这些交互包括打开队列、查询队列的信息、发送消息和接收消息。This exception can be thrown when the Message Queuing channel interacts with a message queue, including opening a queue, querying a queue for information, sending messages, and receiving messages. 异常包括消息队列错误代码。The exception contains the Message Queuing error code. 通常，当框架不能从错误自动恢复并且需要一些人工干预时会引发此异常。Typically, this exception is thrown when the framework cannot recover from the error automatically and requires some human intervention. 例如，如果消息队列未安装并且已试图打开消息队列传输侦听器时，将引发此异常。For example, this exception will be thrown if Message Queuing is not installed and an attempt is made to open the Message Queuing transport listener.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
